title: The Cigar Authority Goes Gangster!
itunes:title: The Cigar Authority Goes Gangster!
description: On today’s Cigar Authority local writer/actor/director/producer Daryl C. Silvia drops by The Cigar Authority to discuss his upcoming mob movie, “Boys.” It's all about premium cigars and mob movies, the perfect blend, on today's Cigar Authority while we're smoking the Davidoff Aniversario No. 3 & the Tatuaje Seleccion.  Author Dennis J. Deeb (DJ) also joins the boys to discuss his latest book, “The Collapse of Middle East Peace.”
content:encoded: On today’s Cigar Authority local writer/actor/director/producer Daryl C. Silvia drops by The Cigar Authority to discuss his upcoming mob movie, “Boys.” It's all about premium cigars and mob movies, the perfect blend, on today's Cigar Authority while we're smoking the Davidoff Aniversario No. 3 & the Tatuaje Seleccion.  Author Dennis J. Deeb (DJ) also joins the boys to discuss his latest book, “The Collapse of Middle East Peace.”
